location.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区通辽市开鲁县

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国通辽市开鲁县下辖的一个类似乡级单位，是开鲁县人民政府农牧局所属的公益一类事业单位，机构规格为正科级。其办公地址在开鲁县182乡道东侧开鲁县种畜场场部。
description.en: A township-level equivalent unit under the jurisdiction of Kailu County, Tongliao City, People's Republic of China. It is a public welfare type 1 public institution affiliated with the Agriculture and Animal Husbandry Bureau of the Kailu County People's Government, with an institutional rank equivalent to a chief section level position. Its office is located at the Kailu County Stud Farm headquarters, on the east side of County Road 182 in Kailu County.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一，位于中国北部边疆。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China, located in the northern frontier of the country.

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区下辖的一个地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区通辽市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Tongliao City, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 开鲁县人民政府农牧局

zh-cn: 开鲁县人民政府农牧局
en: Agriculture and Animal Husbandry Bureau of Kailu County People's Government

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区通辽市开鲁县人民政府下设的负责农牧业工作的部门。
description.en: The department responsible for agriculture and animal husbandry under the People's Government of Kailu County, Tongliao City, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 一种由中国政府利用国有资产设立的，从事教育、科技、文化、卫生等活动的社会服务组织。
description.en: A type of social service organization established by the Chinese government using state-owned assets to engage in activities such as education, science and technology, culture, and health.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一种行政区划单位，与乡、镇在行政级别上相同，但管理方式或功能有所不同。
description.en: A type of administrative division unit in the People's Republic of China, which is at the same administrative level as a township or town but may differ in management style or function.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员的一种职级，通常对应于乡、镇、街道或县级部门内设机构的主要负责人。
description.en: A civil service rank in the People's Republic of China, typically corresponding to the head of a township, town, sub-district, or an internal division of a county-level department.

relationships.target: 开鲁县人民政府农牧局

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext描述，清河牧场是开鲁县人民政府农牧局所属的单位。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Qinghe Pasture is a unit belonging to the Agriculture and Animal Husbandry Bureau of the Kailu County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext描述，清河牧场的机构规格相当于乡科级正职（正科级）。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, the institutional specification of Qinghe Pasture is equivalent to a Township-Section Level Chief Position (Chief Section Level).
